column3: The Draught of Living Death is an extremely powerful Sleeping Draught sending the drinker into a deathlike slumber. Its effects are similar to suspended animation.
Babbling Beverage is a potion that causes the drinker to babble nonsense
The Ageing Potion is a powerful potion which causes the drinker to temporarily become older. The more of the potion consumed the larger the ageing will occur.
